message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your initial offer, but $20,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
